def_cn: 有机的；绿色的；无农害的；不使用化肥的
def_en: Organic methods of farming and gardening use only natural animal and plant products to help the plants or animals grow and be healthy, rather than using chemicals.
Organic substances are of the sort produced by or found in living things.

def_cn: （变化或发展）逐渐的，自然的，演进的
def_en: Organic change or development happens gradually and naturally rather than suddenly.

def_cn: （社群或结构）有机的，统一的，不可分割的
def_en: If a community or structure is an organic whole, each part of it is necessary and fits well with the other parts.
